metadata.name: Dark Esau Helper
metadata.description:
Mod created to help when playing as a Tainted Jacob. Whenever the Dark Esau doing his charge attack, a target showing his end position will be shown (similar to the "Marked") Should work with both his regular attack and Anima Sola.
Special thanks to [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198214567391]Sylmir[/url] for implementing a feature with line following player position while Esau is chained
